message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is quite high. I'm willing to come down slightly to $11,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $10,750. Can you consider that?
